pages.title: Unstable
pages.text: Unstable is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#9243a3)$(l)essence of chaos$(). $(br2)It grants the wielder a chance to periodically apply random effects to themselves.

Keep in mind that this power is highly unpredictable, as it can also have negative effects. $(br2)It's ideal for players that enjoy taking risks and being surprised by the outcome, but it's not recommended for players that prefer consistency in battle.
